code: import*as constants from"../../../constants/courseActionTypes.js";export var getCourses=function getCourses(){return{type:constants.GET_COURSES};};export var createCourse=function createCourse(course){return{type:constants.CREATE_COURSE,payload:course};};export var updateCourse=function updateCourse(course){return{type:constants.UPDATE_COURSE,payload:course};};export var deleteCourse=function deleteCourse(id){return{type:constants.DELETE_COURSE,payload:id};};export var cleanUp=function cleanUp(){return{type:constants.CLEAN_UP};};
